name: Ash Vision
desc:
You toss an object no heavier than 10 pounds into the air, where it is instantly destroyed and transformed into ash that coats you. While you are covered in this ash, you can see a path that leads to the original owner as long as they still reside on the same plane as you.

The path can wind around obstacles and walls, but it does not take into account dangerous terrain or traps.

The spell ends if you are no longer covered in the ash.
empower: Duration increased to 8 hours. The ash can't be washed away without the use of magic.
author: CrusaderDroid
